.. _amdgpu_synid9_base_smem_buf:

sbase
===========================

A 128-bit buffer resource constant for scalar memory operations which provides a base address, a size and a stride.

*Size:* 4 dwords.

*Operands:* :ref:`s<amdgpu_synid_s>`, :ref:`ttmp<amdgpu_synid_ttmp>`
